scripts.deploy-studio: graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --studio -l v0.0.46 harvest-base && npm run after-deploy
scripts.deploy-optimize: graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --studio -l v0.0.47 harvest-base-optimize
scripts.deploy-test-stage-studio: graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --studio -l v0.1.8 l2-base
